name: SHAMA ANJUM
title: Java Software Engineer | Full Stack Web Developer

Career Summary.item1: Four years of software development experience in Java/J2EE, Javascript, Web Services with Agile (Scrum) methodologies and domain expertise in Banking and Financial Services
Career Summary.item2: Expertise in all phases of Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC).
Career Summary.item3: Built web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax and MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React JS, Node.js).
Career Summary.item4: Self-motivated, quick learner and very passionate to learn modern technologies and tools.

Applications Built.title: BumbleBot
Applications Built.description: BumbleBot is a full stack MERN app, which uses the Twitter API to generate “twitter bots”. The app uses Passport.js to authenticate users and store Twitter client data. On the front end, users are provided an interface for automating their twitter account.
Applications Built.tech: React JS, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Passport.js

Applications Built.title: clicky-Game-React-App
Applications Built.description: A memory game developed using React JS library. Components state is managed to respond to user click events.

Applications Built.title: MyPlace
Applications Built.description: A personal homepage designed to provide users with location-based news, events, weather and traffic. Makes ajax calls to external APIs to fetch location baased information. Bookmarked events/articles are stored in Firebase.
Applications Built.tech: JQuery, Bootstrap, modals, Firebase, momentjs, APIs: newsAPI, SeatGeek, openweathermap, mapQuest-GeoCoding API, mapQuest-Traffic API, GoogleMaps

description.item1: Designed and developed web pages with Spring MVC and Hibernate frameworks using Core Java, J2EE, JavaScript, jQuery, Ajax, MySQL with Agile(Scrum) methodologies. Involved in maintaining application and resolved pre-production defects/bugs.
description.item2: Worked on technical documentation and RTM for the projects. Participated in project audits and Code Reviews.
description.item3: Developed code to generate test data and reduced unit testing efforts by 30%.

Certifications and Education.cert: UCSD Coding Bootcamp, UCSD Extension - Full Stack Developer
Certifications and Education.course: An intensive 12-week long full-time coding program dedicated to designing and building web applications using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Java, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express.js, React.js, MongoDB, Mongoose, MySQL, Sequelize, Git, and Heroku.
Bachelor of Engineering, Electronics and Communications
